    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Kulturális élet</string>
            <string language="en">Culturel life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Culturel Leben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie de Culturel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida de Culturel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita di Culturel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή Culturel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida de Culturel</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A magyarországi kultúra helyzete, a nemzeti kultúra kialakítására tett lépések</string>
            <string language="en">The state of the culture in Hungary, They are taken  the steps to the formation of the national culture</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">reformkor,  színjátszás,  magyar nyelv,  </string>
            <string language="en">the age of reform, acting, hungarian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zustand der Kultur in Ungarn, werden sie die 
Jobsteps zur Anordnung der nationalen Kultur unternommen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'état de la culture en Hongrie, elles sont 
prises les mesures à la formation de la culture nationale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estado da cultura em Hungria, são feitos exame 
das etapas à formação da cultura nacional</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il dichiarare della coltura in Ungheria, sono 
prese le misure alla formazione della coltura nazionale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατάσταση του πολιτισμού στην Ουγγαρία, λαμβάνονται 
τα μέτρα στο σχηματισμό του εθνικού πολιτισμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estado de la cultura en Hungría, ella se 
lleva las medidas la formación de la cultura nacional</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">das Alter der Verbesserung, fungierend, ungarische 
Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'âge de la réforme, agissant, langue hongroise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a idade da reforma, agindo, língua hungarian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'età della riforma, comportandosi, linguaggio 
ungherese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ηλικία της μεταρρύθμισης, να ενεργήσει, ουγγρική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la edad de la reforma, actuando, lenguaje húngaro</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
